long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to chat about that crazy plot twist while you're still watching Netflix? Now you can!

Introducing Chatsy, the extension that adds a real-time comments section to your Netflixâ„¢ shows, making your viewing experience more interactive and fun.

Features:

Spoiler Protection: Mark your comments as spoilers so others can enjoy surprises just like you did.

No Sign-Up Needed: Jump straight into the conversation with an automatically assigned username.

Trending Discussions: Stay in the loop by seeing the hottest comments from fellow viewers.

Note: Chatsy is not affiliated with Netflix, Inc. or any of its subsidiaries.
